left-panel.pageSummary: There can be no thought of finishing for ‘aiming for the stars.’ Both figuratively and literally, it is a task to occupy the generations. And no matter how much progress one makes, there is always the thrill of just beginning.

detailed-content-header.headline: Detailed Content
detailed-content-header.summary: There is a very subtle lighting source applied to the Apollo environment. Its default position is in the upper left and may move across the arc to the upper right in specialty transitions.

lego-quote-module.textContent: “This is a Lego Quote Module. It can be used as a lego piece on any page like all other module examples on the detailed-content page.”

prop.headline: Lego Image Right
prop.content: The core material is translucent. It feels like it is in a 3D environment. It floats along the x and y-axis, but has little to no thickness. Objects should have a sense of weightlessness and should float through space with zero friction.

lego-overlap-card.title: Lego Overlap Card
lego-overlap-card.summary: There are numerous success stories you will hear about businesses making it good on the internet . The troubling thing is, there are maybe a tenfold or even a hundredfold of stories inconsistent to theirs. Many have unsuccessfully launched a business venture that is internet based but only a handful shall succeed.
